verses.verse: And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1722> the second<WG1207> sabbath<WG4521> after the first<WG1207>, that<WG1279> he<WG846> went<WG1279> through<WG1223> the corn fields<WG4702>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> plucked<WG5089> the ears of corn<WG4719>, and<WG2532> did eat<WG2068>, rubbing<WG5597> them in<WG5495> their hands<WG5495>.

Blessed<WG3107> are you<WG2075>, when<WG3752> men<WG444> shall hate<WG3404> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> when<WG3752> they shall separate<WG873> you<WG5209> from their company<WG2532>, and shall reproach<WG3679> you<WG2532>, and cast out<WG1544> your<WG5216> name<WG3686> as<WG5613> evil<WG4190>, for<WG1752> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444>'s sake<WG5207>.

But<WG4133> woe<WG3759> to you<WG5213> that are rich<WG4145>! For<WG3754> you have received<WG568> your<WG5216> consolation<WG3874>.

Woe<WG3759> to you<WG5213> that are full<WG1705>! For<WG3754> you shall hunger<WG3983>. Woe<WG3759> to you<WG5213> that laugh<WG1070> now<WG3568>! For<WG3754> you shall mourn<WG3996> and<WG2532> weep<WG2799>.
